description: The alchemist Lilie arrives in the village of Friegen as a wanderer, where she and Resna find the villagers plagued by a debilitating illness. While helping the people of Friegen, they encounter Elie, another alchemist, who appears to be from Lilie's world...
name: The Alchemist of Salburg: Inherited Feelings
The Alchemist of Salburg: Inherited Feelings

description: Hark! A tale from a distant land... Princess Meruru has been spirited away. The mantle of hero falls upon Resna, a former hero's disciple, to enlist the help of noble allies to vanquish the demon king and rescue the princess! Will she prove triumphant?
name: Resna the Hero's Great Adventure: The Imprisoned Princess

description: Within the deepest, darkest depths of a cave once graced by the footsteps of a hero is the fabled resting place of a rare Celestial Silver Stone: the key to forging the Eternal Sword.
name: Ruins of the Sealed Demon

description:
The twin alchemists, Lydie and Suelle.
The first job they accepted in this world was to repair furniture filled with a family's memories.
To fulfill the client's wishes, the twins work with Valeria and begin to make steady progress, but will it work out?
name: Lydie & Suelle's Everyday Lives ~A Shared Canvas of Memories~
Lydie & Suelle's Everyday Lives ~A Shared Canvas of Memories~

description: Alchemist Ryza has a chance reunion with her mentor, Empel, who taught her alchemy. Ryza, Empel, and their former adventuring companions set out to explore the ruins known as "Paradise." But what awaits them there?
name: Ryza's Adventure Graffiti: Sage of Oblivion & the Secret Paradise
Sage of Oblivion & the Secret Paradise
Sage of Oblivion & the Secret Paradise EX

description:
In Lantarna, there's a festival known as the Starbirth Festival.
Invited by Resna, Patricia decides to participate as the Starbirth Envoy, handing out gifts to the townspeople. However, when she hears Tao's wish, she just can't bring herself to accept it.
name: Gifts on a Starry Night
Gifts on a Starry Night EX

description:
As the year draws to a close, Marie misses her own world.
When she visits the Atelier for the first time in a while, she learns that Resna is planning to distribute special talismans to friends as a New Year's greeting, and she decides to help.
But it would seem that Marie's interactions with her friends in this world have an interesting effect on her.
name: Marie's Fortune Frenzy!

description:
Overlooking the sea, alchemists Shallistera and Shallotte remember their responsibilities back in their home world.
All while they also glance at the fun going on in the capital.
In the midst of this, Shallotte's mother, Nady, mentions that she has found a request that would be perfect for them.
name: Two Shallies and a Mother's Wish
Two Shallies and a Mother's Wish
Two Shallies and a Mother's Wish EX

description: Alchemist Escha learns about the Linde Festival, a special day for sharing chocolates with those you cherish. She is determined to give chocolates to her close colleague Logy, but at the same time finds herself in charge of creating a new menu item for the cafe. To add even more to the mix, she has also received some requests from Wilbell and Juna. So much to do, so little time!
name: Valentine's Chocolate Mix

description: For the first time in ages, snow falls in the capital, blanketing the city with a beautiful silver glow. Seizing the moment, Rorona and Totori decide to go for a fashionable outing in the snow, where they stumble upon Meruru together with a seemingly lost girl. Sterk also ends up joining the cause, and the group of four embark on a mission to help the lost girl.
name: The Alchemist of Arland: The Lost Girl & the Snowy Road Home

description: These snowy mountains are rarely trodden by humans, allowing nature to remain untouched, but also ensuring that almost no research has ever been done, especially in the more remote depths. Some adventurers claim to have heard voices in the mountains, but nobody has ever ventured far enough to confirm these claims.
name: Desolate Snow Peaks
It's a Pleasure to Meet You

description: A marshy region deep in the heart of nature. Apothecaries from the royal capital often visit to gather medicinal herbs. The wind blowing over the flowers floating on the water's surface makes a sound resembling hushed whispers, hence the marsh's namesake.
name: Breezy Waterside

description: A secluded place deep in the wetlands that is full of colorful aquatic flowers. Despite being so close to the capital, the difficult, muddy terrain means few people venture out here. Rumor has it this marsh is home to a number of as-yet undiscovered plants.
name: Driftblossom Marsh

description: A cavern in the mountains near Friegen. The glow emanating from lapis lazuli crystals illuminates the deep dark of the cave's interior. Adventurers who once visited the cave spoke of witnessing a solemn white flower blooming in solitude deep within.
name: Sparkling Crevasse

description: A dark expanse that many adventurers have explored in the past, in pursuit of a white flower rumored to bloom in its depths. The eerie darkness calls out to those brave enough to enter.
name: Abyss Garden

description: Located on the coast near the capital, this is a habitat for many creatures living in its generous shallows. Beautiful flowers bloom from a huge tree on an island off the coast, and the petals that drop from these flowers float to the shore.
name: Blooming Cape

description: A rugged quiet spot nestled to the the west of the beach. A small waterfall in this rocky crevice sprays cool mists, perfect for those seeking respite from the heat. Visitors who come to this hidden gem can enjoy swimming in cool waters.
name: Rocky Waterfall

description: Just beyond the heart of the capital lies the ruins of a civilization now lost to the sands of time. The walls and ceilings have crumbled and the ruins have been reclaimed by nature, gradually succumbing to relentless creeping vines.
name: Cloister

description: This section of the ruins must have once been the residential area, but now it is home to deadly monsters. Adventurers lured by the promise of treasure often go missing in this area.
name: Memory Hall

description: One of the volcanoes in Haine, the southern part of the kingdom. Lava flows like a river, making exploration dangerous. The area was once covered in volcanic ash, but the ashfall has subsided in recent times.
name: Ashen Hem

description: Located near the top of the volcano, Dragon's Peak is a place where precious ores are naturally produced. However, due to the harsh environment, locals rarely set foot in the area. It is said that a dragon once lived here, and its roar could be heard at the foot of the mountain.
name: Dragon's Peak

description: A vast grassland in Haine. The area is largely untouched by man, so the natural landscape stretches far and wide. The tall grass hides the presence of monsters, making exploration no simple task.
name: Deep Grasslands

description: A marshland that stretches deep into the Haine wilderness. Water gushing from the ground has formed springs throughout the area. These springs, rich in nutrients, support a diverse range of fish and plant life.
name: Shimmering Springs

description: A closed mine shaft in the capital region. The mine was built to extract mana from the ground, but the results were not as hoped and the plans were abandoned. The mine is now rarely entered by people, instead serving as a lair for monsters.
name: Abandoned Mineshaft

description: In the maze of mine shafts, tracks were laid for carts to transport people and supplies. These carts, once symbols of lofty aspirations, now lie rusted and abandoned.
name: Trail of Aspirations

description: Located in Schnell at the northernmost tip of the kingdom, this region along a mountain range is covered in snow and ice year-round due to its cold climate, providing a habitat for flora and fauna that have adapted to the harsh conditions. Hot springs have sprung up throughout the region and become popular local attractions.
name: Silver Ridge

description: Located in the northernmost part of Schnell, this mountainous region is known for its particularly harsh cold, requiring extensive preparation to navigate its deep snow-covered trails. There is little human traffic, and rescue is impossible should you become stranded.
name: Deep Snow Bluff

description: A tower that stands tall in Kur province. It is said to have been built long ago by a nobleman who sought to seize the stars. Legend has it that the roses in the tower's garden were soaked in the nobleman's blood, causing things in the tower to float.
name: Celestial Gloom Tower

description: A hidden passage within the Tower of Drifting Currents. The roses mentioned in the legends are said to lie beyond this passage. The encroaching vines have caused the walls to crumble, sealing the entrance. Whether the roses sealed the entrance for their own protection, or to hide the dream's end, is unknown...
name: Passage to the Remnants of Dreams

description: An ancient ruin in Kur province. The area is known as a prime location for medicinal herbs, drawing people from across the continent. The garden is overrun with flowers, surrounding relics of a bygone era. While the origin of the ruins is unknown, it is said to be related to the abundant plant life.
name: Garden of Serenity
リディー＆スールの日常 EX
